snippet: The Senate has voted to raise taxes on the wealthy, while the House has voted to keep taxes low for everyone and compromise seems unlikely. How are affluent investors coping with the uncertainty?
abstract: Paul Sullivan Wealth Matters column analyzes the automatic tax increases that will take effect in 2013, barring Congressional intervention; takes note of what several high net-worth investors are doing to protect their assets.
lead_paragraph: The Senate has voted to raise taxes on the wealthy, while the House has voted to keep taxes low for everyone and compromise seems unlikely. How are affluent investors coping with the uncertainty?

headline.print_headline: What Some Investors Are Doing to Anticipate a Tax Increase
headline.seo: What Some Investors Are Doing to Anticipate a Tax Increase
headline.main: What Some Investors Are Doing to Anticipate a Tax Increase
